plot: A young English student in Paris looks after dogs to make ends meet.She finds that man's best friend can sometimes be an unexpected burden.
title: Dog Sitting
plot_es: A young English student in Paris looks after dogs to make ends meet.She finds that man's best friend can sometimes be an unexpected burden.
plot_en: A young English student in Paris looks after dogs to make ends meet.She finds that man's best friend can sometimes be an unexpected burden.
